reviews.title: Not Bad!
reviews.comment: Controls a little hard to get the hang of,  but fun just the same. Smooth,  nice graphics.
reviews.author: Jeff Rodrequez

reviews.title: The big bang juice
reviews.comment: Really good game I like it
reviews.author: Kathleen Whitney

reviews.title: Waste of time!
reviews.comment: You really have to bash the blocks to make them disappear making it unplayable!
reviews.author: Angie Dominic
